prompt:
Patient: This is Wallace.

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Wallace Ponce?

Patient: Yes. It is.

responses.gpt4: Great! It's nice to speak with you today, Wallace. I'm calling on behalf of your doctor, Dr. Martin Willis. I wanted to see how you're doing at home after your hospital stay. How have you been feeling?
responses.our_model: Hello. I'm glad to hear you're back home from the hospital. How are you feeling today?
